outputs.output_descr:
As part of the joint UN HIV/AIDS programme, UNDP's support the achievement of the HIV/AIDS targets outlined in the PASDEP through a) ensuring the successful implementation of the three ones principle and promoting multi sectoral response by mainstreaming HIVAIDS in all public and civil society sectors and b) creating an enabling environment to protect the human rights of people living with HIV/AIDS with an emphasis on empowering women to reduce their vulnerability to infection. 

To achieve the joint programmes objectives, UNDP will work in partnership with UNCT, civil society organizations, government sectoral offices and learning institutions drawing on its comparative advantage as a lead organization for HIV/AIDS and development, governance, mainstreaming, and human rights and gender.   

This project works towards mobilization and empowerment of communities and vulnerable populations through capacity building

Under this project UNDP also mobilized other resources to Support the People Living with HIV Stigma Index Roll-Out Study in Ethiopia.
